```py
name: Build and Deploy to Cloud Run
on:
Â Â push:
Â Â Â Â branches:
Â Â Â Â - vol-3
env:
Â Â PROJECT_ID: ${{ secrets.RUN_PROJECT }}
Â Â RUN_REGION: asia-south1
Â Â SERVICE_NAME: flask-cookbook-git
jobs:
Â Â setup-build-deploy:
Â Â Â Â name: Setup, Build, and Deploy
Â Â Â Â runs-on: ubuntu-latest
Â Â Â Â steps:
Â Â Â Â - name: Checkout
Â Â Â Â Â Â uses: actions/checkout@v3
Â Â Â Â # Setup gcloud CLI
Â Â Â Â - uses: 'google-github-actions/auth@v1'
Â Â Â Â Â Â with:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â credentials_json: ${{ secrets.RUN_SA_KEY }}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â project_id: ${{ secrets.RUN_PROJECT }}
Â Â Â Â # Build and push image to Google Container Registry
Â Â Â Â - name: Build
Â Â Â Â Â Â run: |-
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â gcloud builds submit \
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â --quiet \
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â --tag "gcr.io/$PROJECT_ID/$SERVICE_NAME"
Â Â Â Â # Deploy image to Cloud Run
Â Â Â Â - name: Deploy
Â Â Â Â Â Â run: |-
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â gcloud run deploy "$SERVICE_NAME" \
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â --quiet \
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â --region "$RUN_REGION" \
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â --image "gcr.io/$PROJECT_ID/$SERVICE_NAME" \
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â --platform "managed" \
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â --allow-unauthenticated
```
